bill_title: designate a portion of U.S. Highway 83 as Sicangu Lakota Code Talker Highway.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to designate a portion of U.S. Highway 83 as Sicangu Lakota Code Talker Highway. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That chapter 31-4 be amended with a NEW SECTION: The department shall designate U.S. Highway 83 from south of the White River to the Nebraska-South Dakota border as Sicangu Lakota Code Talker Highway.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
